EmailTemplate.name: YETI Pro Need More Info
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thanks for submitting your application for the YETI Pro Program. We need some additional information to complete your application.
Please provide us with documents that verify your request for YETI Pro status. These include, but are not limited, to the following:
Professional business card
Resume
Guide license or other credentials
Website link
Brochure
Social media profiles
As always, please be in touch with questions. Weâ€™d be happy to hear from you.
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname}
YETI Marketing Team
512.394.9384 yeti.com
